pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering and Feature Screening using L1 Fusion Penalty // Provides the Big Merge Tracker and COSCI algorithms for convex clustering and feature screening using L1 fusion penalty. See Radchenko, P. and Mukherjee, G. (2017) doi:10.1111/rssb.12226 and T.Banerjee et al. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2017.08.001 for more details.
